def process(a):
    if a == "+":
        return 1
    else:
        return -1
cases = int(raw_input())
for i in range(cases):
    cases2 = int(raw_input())
    names = {}
    for j in range(cases2):
        inp = raw_input().split()
        if inp[0] not in names.keys():
            names[inp[0]] = process(inp[1])
        else:
            names[inp[0]] = process(inp[1])
    print sum(names.values())
